pages.text: Item transfer methods. $(br2)To avoid lag, design systems that don't try to fill a container that is full.

pages.title: Xnet
pages.text: Highly configurable transfer system that can handle items, fluids, gasses and power. Also contains logic systems for configuration. Allows stack transfer and transfer rate adjustment to reduce lag.

pages.title: EnderIO
pages.text: A variety of conduits that handle items, fluids, power, and redstone.

pages.title: Thermal Dynamics
pages.text: A variety of ducts that handle items, fluids, power, and redstone.

pages.title: Mekanism
pages.text: A variety of cables that handle items, fluids, gasses, and power

pages.text: Highly configurable transfer system that can handle items, fluids, gasses and power. Also contains logic systems for configuration.
